changeSet.author: rgalante
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TAMW_restriction (id, role_id, permission_id, resourceTypePermission, action, v) SELECT (TAMW_permission.id-TAMW_role.id+650) AS id, TAMW_role.id AS role_id, TAMW_permission.id AS permission_id, 'DEFAULT_ONLY', 'CREATE', 0 FROM TAMW_role JOIN TAMW_role_permission ON TAMW_role.id = TAMW_role_permission.roles_id JOIN TAMW_permission ON TAMW_role_permission.permissions_id = TAMW_permission.id WHERE TAMW_permission.value = 'ADD_NEW_RES_OF_DEFAULT_RESTYPE' AND TAMW_role_permission.roles_id = TAMW_role.id;

INSERT INTO TAMW_restriction (id, role_id, permission_id, resourceTypePermission, action, v) SELECT (TAMW_permission.id-TAMW_role.id+650) AS id, TAMW_role.id AS role_id, TAMW_permission.id AS permission_id, 'DEFAULT_ONLY', 'DELETE', 0 FROM TAMW_role JOIN TAMW_role_permission ON TAMW_role.id = TAMW_role_permission.roles_id JOIN TAMW_permission ON TAMW_role_permission.permissions_id = TAMW_permission.id WHERE TAMW_permission.value = 'DELETE_RES_INSTANCE_OF_DEFAULT_RESTYPE' AND TAMW_role_permission.roles_id = TAMW_role.id;

INSERT INTO TAMW_restriction (id, role_id, permission_id, resourceTypePermission, action, v) SELECT (TAMW_permission.id-TAMW_role.id+650) AS id, TAMW_role.id AS role_id, TAMW_permission.id AS permission_id, 'NON_DEFAULT_ONLY', 'UPDATE', 0 FROM TAMW_role JOIN TAMW_role_permission ON TAMW_role.id = TAMW_role_permission.roles_id JOIN TAMW_permission ON TAMW_role_permission.permissions_id = TAMW_permission.id WHERE TAMW_permission.value = 'EDIT_NOT_DEFAULT_RES_OF_RESTYPE' AND TAMW_role_permission.roles_id = TAMW_role.id;

update.where: permission_id IN (SELECT id FROM TAMW_permission WHERE value = 'ADD_NEW_RES_OF_DEFAULT_RESTYPE' or value = 'DELETE_RES_INSTANCE_OF_DEFAULT_RESTYPE' or value = 'EDIT_NOT_DEFAULT_RES_OF_RESTYPE')

delete.where: permissions_id IN (SELECT id FROM TAMW_permission WHERE value = 'ADD_NEW_RES_OF_DEFAULT_RESTYPE' or value = 'DELETE_RES_INSTANCE_OF_DEFAULT_RESTYPE' or value = 'EDIT_NOT_DEFAULT_RES_OF_RESTYPE')
